title: Improving Healthcare Through Genetic Testing
itunes:title: Improving Healthcare Through Genetic Testing
description:
Sean George, CEO at Invitae, discusses the next era of genetic testing using data to improve mainstream medical care. He says the company lowers the cost and increases the access to genetic information.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Vincent Cignarella (guest co-host). Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
